'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{lax3}}.

## Background

The top level of collections, occupied by its wardens, the vithrack, the terrace is a treacherous collection of platforms perched high above the lower floors of the Halls Obscured, overseen by [Sissak](/sissak/), its warden.

The vithrak in this area may be made allies by talking to Sissak with the [Warden Contract](/wardenContract/) quest item and/or succeeding on a 15+ Metaphysics (there are also 18+ History and 13 Streetwise option) dialog check. This frees the vithrak in the entire sanctum from their bondage, allowing the party to walk freely through their areas.

## Points of interest

* This sizable arena is not for the faint of heart - or those afraid of spiders. Vithrack brutes, luminaries, and regular spiders prowl the area, with the main point of interest being the giant, cocoon-like structure to the northwest, which is the home of the vithrack warden. To the west lie the Confiscated Sundries, which include a ''wealth'' of loot and a soulbound light armor.
* To the southwest lies the Spider Hatchery which is trapped, but includes [Recipe - Entrancing Daze](/recipeEntrancingDaze/) that can be given to [Drowsy Puke](/drowsyPuke/) to unlock another resting option.
* The southeast includes the [Giftwrapper](/giftwrapper/) spider pet for collection and [Vithrack Silk Slippers](/vithrackSilkSlippers/). If you deal with Sissak peacefully, a vithrack vendor will be available here after the confrontation.

## Characters

* [Sissak](/sissak/), vithrack.
*[Vessatraz](/vessatraz/), vithrack merchant.

## Loot

* [Robes of the Weyc](/robesOfTheWeyc/): In the Confiscated Sundries.
* [Vithrack Silk Slippers](/vithrackSilkSlippers/): In the southeastern section, sold by Vessatraz.
* [Recipe - Entrancing Daze](/recipeEntrancingDaze/): Southwestern corner of the map, on a corpse covered by webs, lying beside a lot of egg sacks.
* [Giftwrapper](/giftwrapper/): Southeastern corner of the map, at left side of the bridge going north. Highlighted as Adorable Spider.

###### Sissak's Nest

* [The Third Eye](/theThirdEye/): Dropped or given by Sissak, depending on how you solved your [encounter](/sissakQuests/) with him.
